title: (Minister of State at the Department of Transport, Tourism and Sport) Order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Minister of State at the Department of Transport, Tourism and Sport) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department transport tourism sport) order

title: (Minister of State at the Department of Transport, Tourism and Sport) Order
(Minister of State at the Department of Transport, Tourism and Sport) Order
heading: 2. Paul Melia, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Paul Melia, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Transport, Tourism and Sport, is appointed to be a 
Special Adviser to Hildegarde Naughton, Minister of State at the Department 
of Transport, Tourism and Sport with effect from 29 June 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

15 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [466] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS,

D02 DR67.
